description: This file defines API endpoints related to user portfolio management, including listing, creating, updating, and deleting portfolio items using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI's router class used to define a group of API endpoints with a common prefix and tags.

methods.name: list_portfolio(user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: GET endpoint to retrieve all portfolio items for the current user.

methods.name: create_portfolio(payload: PortfolioItemIn, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: POST endpoint to create a new portfolio item for the current user.

methods.name: update_portfolio( item_id: int, payload: PortfolioItemIn, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: PUT endpoint to update an existing portfolio item specified by item_id.

methods.name: delete_portfolio(item_id: int, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: DELETE endpoint to delete a portfolio item specified by item_id.

ctags.name: create_portfolio
ctags.pattern: /^def create_portfolio(payload: PortfolioItemIn, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Sessi/
ctags.signature: (payload: PortfolioItemIn, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: delete_portfolio
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_portfolio(item_id: int, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends/
ctags.signature: (item_id: int, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: list_portfolio
ctags.pattern: /^def list_portfolio(user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: update_portfolio
ctags.signature: ( item_id: int, payload: PortfolioItemIn, user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
